problems.title: Problems
problems.description: In the current context, ensuring food security has become a crucial priority to protect consumer health. Food safety management applications must address several major challenges to ensure safe and healthy food. Here are the main problems our application aims to solve

objectives.title: Objectives
objectives.description: The main objective of our food safety application is to ensure the safety and quality of the food you consume, by providing powerful tools to detect potential risks and provide crucial information in real-time.

allergens.title: Allergen Management
allergens.description: Effectively identify and manage allergens in your products, ensuring full compliance with food safety standards.

poisoning.title: Poisoning Risks
poisoning.description: Poison is a deadly substance that can be used to kill people.

salmonella.name: Salmonella
salmonella.body: Salmonella is a group of bacteria that can cause food poisoning.

ecoli.name: E. coli
ecoli.body: Escherichia coli (E. coli) is a bacteria commonly found in the intestines of humans and animals.

listeria.name: Listeria
listeria.body: Listeria monocytogenes is a bacteria that can cause listeriosis, a serious infection usually caused by eating contaminated food.

botulism.name: Botulism
botulism.body: Botulism is a rare but potentially deadly illness caused by a toxin produced by the bacterium Clostridium botulinum.

aflatoxins.name: Aflatoxins
aflatoxins.body: Aflatoxins are toxic compounds produced by certain molds, particularly Aspergillus flavus and Aspergillus parasiticus.

halal.title: Halal Food Certification
halal.description: Ensures that foods comply with halal standards, ensuring complete traceability and compliance.

mobileApp.title: Mobile Application
mobileApp.description: Discover our innovative mobile application for food safety management. Track and manage inventory, monitor product quality, and receive real-time alerts about potential risks. Ensure that food meets the strictest safety standards while maintaining an overview of operations.

ai.title: Artificial Intelligence
ai.description: Our advanced AI solution analyzes food components to ensure their safety. Through cutting-edge algorithms, we can detect contaminants, evaluate nutritional values, and ensure compliance with food safety standards. Protect consumers and maintain product quality with our innovative technology.

web.title: Web Interface
web.description: Through our web platform, you will have all the information about our application. Our intuitive interface allows you to make informed decisions quickly and efficiently.

contaminants.title: Contaminants and Foreign Bodies Detection
contaminants.description: AI can analyze food scan data to identify the presence of contaminants such as pesticides, heavy metals, or pathogens. Through advanced algorithms, it can detect traces that might escape traditional analysis methods.

nutrition.title: Nutritional Values Assessment
nutrition.description: AI can provide accurate assessments of food nutritional values by analyzing their composition. This not only allows verification of products' nutritional quality but also helps advise consumers on healthier food choices based on their specific needs.

compliance.title: Food Safety Standards Compliance
compliance.description: Using machine learning models, AI can compare food test results with current safety standards. This helps ensure products meet regulations and quality standards, thus reducing the risk of non-compliance.

prediction.title: Prediction and Prevention
prediction.description: AI can analyze trends and historical data to predict potential food safety issues before they occur. For example, it can identify recurring patterns of contamination or deviation from standards, allowing early and proactive intervention to prevent potential crises.

multiplatform.title: With eath,
multiplatform.description: enjoy an exceptional cross-platform experience on Android, iPhone, and more.

auth.title: Access your personal space
auth.subtitle: with enhanced security.
auth.videoUnsupported: Your browser does not support the video tag.

content.title: Explore our content
content.subtitle: through these fascinating pages.
content.videoUnsupported: Your browser does not support the video tag.

testimonials.title: Food Tragedies
testimonials.subtitle: Fatal Incidents Due to Allergens and Poisons.

cases.name: Cyril M. Smith
cases.body: Cyril M. Smith died after consuming a dish containing undeclared allergens. His severe allergic reaction led to fatal complications.

cases.name: Sophie Grégoire Trudeau
cases.body: Sophie Grégoire Trudeau suffered a severe allergic reaction due to food cross-contamination. Although she survived, the complications had a lasting impact on her health.

cases.name: Vladimir Putin
cases.body: Vladimir Putin was the victim of an attempted poisoning with polonium-210. Although not directly food-related, this incident highlights the dangers of toxic substances.

cases.name: Mahatma Gandhi
cases.body: Mahatma Gandhi suffered numerous health problems related to his diet during his fasting periods. Although the main cause of his death was a bullet, his dietary habits contributed to his health problems.

cases.name: Jimi Hendrix
cases.body: Jimi Hendrix died from a drug overdose, exacerbated by his digestive and dietary health problems. His eating habits played a role in his health issues.

cases.name: Marlon Brando
cases.body: Marlon Brando died from health complications related to inadequate nutrition and excess weight, contributing to his serious medical problems.

cases.name: Karen Carpenter
cases.body: Karen Carpenter died from severe anorexia, a disorder related to inadequate nutrition and food health problems.

cases.name: Anton Pavlovich Chekhov
cases.body: Anton Pavlovich Chekhov died of tuberculosis, but he suffered from health problems related to inadequate nutrition and infectious diseases.

cases.name: Alexander Litvinenko
cases.body: Former Russian secret service agent Alexander Litvinenko was poisoned with polonium-210 in 2006. The poisoning largely took place during a meeting at a London restaurant. His case is well documented and had a wide media impact.

linkApp.title: Available on all platforms
linkApp.description: Our food safety mobile application is now accessible on the App Store and Google Play Store. Whether you're an iOS or Android user, you can take advantage of our advanced technology to scan and verify food safety wherever you are. Download it today for safer and more conscious eating!

sheet.title: Menu
sheet.description: Explore the different sections of our site.

description.part1: eath is a startup that has developed a sophisticated mobile application that ensures food security for consumers worldwide. The start-up is registered with the African Intellectual Property Organization (OAPI).
description.part2: Indeed, we are changing the world through this innovation, which is a technical solution that addresses technical problems of food security and public health through the following features.

vision.title: Vision
vision.text: Inspire the next generation to tackle challenges through innovation and social entrepreneurship.

values.title: Values
values.text: Reduce food consumption risks by up to 1.03%, provide consumers with a precise, reliable food analysis tool. Guarantee safe food consumption for the public.

origin.title: Origin
origin.text: The idea for this application arose from growing concerns about food security and gaps observed in current detection tools. Initiated by a team passionate about technology and food security, the application was designed to meet a growing demand for accessible and effective solutions to verify food compliance and safety with standard norms.

technology.title: Technology
technology.text: Our application relies on a combination of cutting-edge technologies, including artificial intelligence algorithms and computer vision techniques. These technologies enable rapid analysis of scanned foods to detect the presence of harmful substances. We use modern platforms for development, such as React for the frontend and cloud solutions for data processing, ensuring optimal performance and enhanced security.

ingredients.title: Precise Ingredient Analysis
ingredients.text: Uses artificial intelligence to scan and identify all meal components. Food groups (beverages, cereals, meats, etc.) are precisely classified.

halal.title: Halal Compliance
halal.text: Specific algorithms* verify meal compliance with Halal standards. To meet the criteria of religious communities requiring Halal options.

allergens.title: Allergen Detection
allergens.text: Our application identifies potential allergens to prevent allergic reactions. Consumers can order their food with confidence, knowing their safety will be taken into account.

harmful.title: Harmful Substances and Nutrition
harmful.text: A reliable integrated system for drugs, poisons, and toxins will prevent any risk of intoxication, accidental contamination, or poisoning in meals. The system intercepts nutritional information, analyzes it, and looks for traces of suspicious elements in foods. If applicable, when the result is positive, the information will be sent to the smartphone interface to alert the user.

nutrition.title: Nutritional Intake
nutrition.text: Furthermore, a meal nutritional calculation feature will be included in our application to allow everyone to understand the beneficial nutritional intake that consumed meals generate for our health and well-being. It's also a tool for diabetic subjects, dieters, obese people, and vegetarians to balance or calibrate their daily dietary regimens by making choices that would meet their body's real needs.

social.title: Social Inclusion
social.text: We use advanced technologies to facilitate the development of this mobile application with the integration of voice assistant, which also promotes the use of this digital tool by visually impaired people.

targets.title: Our Targets
targets.text: Global population, fast-food chains, hotel chains, tourism sector, university restaurants, school cafeterias, boarding schools, as well as athletes and sports communities.

whyUs.title: Why choose
whyUs.name: eath
whyUs.description: It is estimated that 600 million people fall ill after eating contaminated food each year worldwide according to WHO, resulting in 420,000 deaths, children under 5 years of age bear 40% of the burden of foodborne diseases and 125,000 die each year with a loss of 33 million years of healthy life. It is for this purpose that our Eath mobile application helps save lives and ensures that what we eat poses no danger.

security.title: Food Security
security.description: Thanks to our precise analysis, you can consume your meals safely.

compliance.title: Compliance and Respect
compliance.description: Meet specific dietary requirements such as Halal standards.

prevention.title: Allergy Prevention
prevention.description: Avoid allergic reactions through allergen detection.

health.title: Health and Wellness
health.description: Understand the nutritional content of your meals and make healthy food choices.

services.mainTitle: In a world where food security is a growing concern
services.subtitle: a food safety management application becomes essential to protect consumer health.

ingredients.title: Precise Ingredient Analysis
ingredients.description: uses artificial intelligence to scan and identify all meal components. Food groups (beverages, cereals, meats, etc.) are precisely classified.

allergens.title: Allergen Detection
allergens.description: Our application identifies potential allergens to prevent allergic reactions. Consumers can order their food with confidence, knowing their safety will be taken into account.

halal.title: Halal Compliance
halal.description: Specific algorithms* verify meal compliance with Halal standards. To meet the criteria of religious communities requiring Halal options.

nutrition.title: Nutritional Intake
nutrition.description: Furthermore, a meal nutritional calculation feature will be included in our application.

otherServices.title: Our other services
otherServices.subtitle: This revolutionary application uses technology to ensure that the food we consume is safe and risk-free

history.title: Scan History
history.description: A history of scanned foods with details on each scan, allowing users to review information about products they have previously scanned.

harmful.title: Harmful Substances and Nutrition
harmful.description: A reliable integrated system for detecting drugs, poisons, and toxins will prevent any risk of intoxication, accidental contamination, or poisoning in meals. The system intercepts nutritional information for analysis and then looks for traces of harmful substances in the meal. At the slightest suspicion of traces of these harmful substances, the information is sent to the phone interface to warn the person. As a result, these technologies help consumers ensure they eat their meals safely and healthily.

social.title: Social Inclusion
social.description: we use advanced technologies to facilitate the development of this mobile application with the integration of a voice assistant that ensures increased accessibility by guaranteeing food safety for visually impaired people and promoting social equity.

development.title: Development Division
development.description: mobile application and web platform development team

origins.title: Our Origins
origins.description: The members of our startup team come from academic backgrounds, passionate about their work, we take on challenges by transforming what is excellent into something perfect.

motivation.title: Our Motivation
motivation.description: Having been inspired by recent crisis episodes: COVID 19, wars, poverty, famine, environmental degradation, youth unemployment, we have risen to embrace the social responsibility of our communities.

ambition.title: Our Ambition
ambition.description: This is what makes us a high-potential startup. Our mobile application could disrupt many sectors, as any innovation involves changes.

expertise.title: Our Expertise
expertise.description: In addressing the global food security problem, we have a deep understanding of the problem and the target.

business.title: Our Business Model
business.description: Our social enterprise model aims to meet social requirements in terms of food security and public health.

impact.title: Our Impact
impact.description: Ultimately, our Eath startup will have a significant positive impact on the environment and populations for years to come.

discussion.title: Let's discuss together
discussion.description: Feel free to leave your questions below or call us to speak with our dedicated sales team.

unavailable.title: ❌ Oops
unavailable.description: Sorry for the inconvenience, but this feature is not yet available. Please contact us directly via phone number
